snippet: Ohio State’s new compliance measures include educating student-athletes on how to budget their money as well as monitoring athletes’ spending habits, which has raised concerns about violations of privacy.
abstract: Ohio State’s recent compliance measures include educating student-athletes, especially football and men's and women's basketball players, on how to budget their money as well as monitoring athletes’ spending habits, raising concerns about violations of privacy.
lead_paragraph: Ohio State’s new compliance measures include educating student-athletes on how to budget their money as well as monitoring athletes’ spending habits, which has raised concerns about violations of privacy.

headline.seo: Ohio State’s Monitoring of Athletes’ Spending Raises Privacy Concerns
headline.main: Ohio State’s Monitoring of Athletes’ Spending Raises Concerns
headline.print_headline: Ohio State’s Monitoring of Athletes’ Spending Raises Concerns
